thread.title: JPMorgan Chief James Dimon Likes the Bank’s Growth Prospects, Despite Risks

author: Emily Glazer
title: JPMorgan Chief James Dimon Likes the Bank’s Growth Prospects, Despite Risks
text:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. chief James Dimon shared an optimistic view of the bank’s growth prospects in his annual shareholder letter published Thursday.
Mr. Dimon, chairman and chief executive of the largest U.S. bank by assets, focused on potential boosts in JPMorgan’s businesses ranging from fixed-income trading to new-country expansion to opportunities in wealth management.
That... RELATED VIDEO A Brief History of Retail Banking The retail banking industry is undergoing another major shift, and the future looks high-tech, sophisticated, and, for big banks, very urban. So what has changed? Photo: Shaumbé Wright/The Wall Street Journal
